product_name: Nordica Ace of Spades Team Ski Boots - Juniors' - 2011/2012
long_description: The juniors' Nordica Ace of Spades Team ski boots offers the shock-absorbent comfort of adult boots in a size that's perfect for up-and-coming shredders. The Nordica Ace of Spades Team ski boots feature a 3-piece shell construction that makes it easy to get feet into boots. Shock-absorbent technology helps them hone their park-and-pipe skills while enjoying comfort. Additional padding in the tongues and cuffs absorbs shock and damps vibrations, making the ride smooth and easy. Kids' liners feature soft padding and a warm fleece lining. Loop on tongues aids in putting the boots on and taking them off. 3-buckle closures offer solid leverage to ensure the best possible wrappings of the feet; instep retention promotes safe and comfortable landings. All 3 aluminum buckles are microadjustable, so young skiers can dial in the fit for comfort and performance. 30mm cuff straps act as a fourth buckle, letting the user adjust tightness around the upper ankle. Flex index of 80 offers resistance appropriate for young skiers.
